title: Nea Apollonia
text:
Nea Apollonia () is a village and a <a href="Communities%20and%20Municipalities%20of%20Greece">community</a> of the <a href="Volvi%20%28municipality%29">Volvi municipality</a>. Before the 2011 local government reform it was part of the municipality of <a href="Apollonia%2C%20Thessaloniki">Apollonia</a>, of which it was a municipal district. The 2011 census recorded 1,851 inhabitants in the village and 1,922 inhabitants in the community. The community of Nea Apollonia covers an area of 70.855 km2.
Administrative division.

The aforementioned population figures are as of 2011.
